mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_board(title, content, no, ck, reg_date) values(#{title}, #{content}, seq_t_exam_board_no.nextVal, 'false', #{regDate})
mapper.select: select title, content, no, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, ck from t_exam_board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_grade(name, id, title, content, no, score) values(#{name}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{no}, #{score})
